title: Trump's NATO Criticism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/11/18
itunes:title: Trump's NATO Criticism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/11/18
description:
George Noory and Russian Studies expert Stephen Cohen examine President Trump's remarks on military spending at the NATO summit, as well as his upcoming meeting with Russian President Putin.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
